lines.gurmukhi: drsn joiq ko audoq Ascrj mY ikMcq ktwC kY ibsm koit iDAwn hY
lines.transliteration_english: Darasan Joti Ko Udot Asacharaj Mai , Kinchat Kataachh Kai Bisam Koti Dhiaan Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: A sight of the divine refulgence of the True Guru is full of astonishment. A momentary glance of grace of the True Guru baffles millions of contemplation.

lines.gurmukhi: mMd muskwin bwin prmdBuiq giq mDur bcn kY Qkq koit igAwn hY
lines.transliteration_english: Mand Mousakaani Baani Paramadabhouti Gati , Madhur Bachan Kai Dakat Koti Giaan Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Sweet smiling nature of the True Guru is marvellous. Millions of understandings and perceptions are paltry before his elixir like utterances.

lines.gurmukhi: eyk aupkwr ky ibQwr ko n pwrwvwru koit aupkwr ismrn aunmwn hY
lines.transliteration_english: Ayk Oupakaar Kay Bidaar Ko N Paaraavaaru , Koti Oupakaar Simaran Ounamaan Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: The grandeur of a blessing of the True Guru is fathomless. And therefore, to remember other good deeds is trifle and meaningless.

lines.gurmukhi: dieAwiniD kiRpwiniD suKiniD soBwiniD mihmw inDwn gMimqw n kwhU Awn hY ]142]
lines.transliteration_english: Daiaanidhi Kripaanidhi Soukhanidhi Sobhaanidhi , Mahimaa Nidhaan Ganmitaa N Kaahoo Aan Hai ?142?

Shabad OS B.translation: He is a treasure-house of kindness and ocean of clemency and sea of comforts. He is such a vast storehouse of praise and coffer of grandeur that no one else can reach it. (142)
